      • Class healthyBites.view.GoalPanel

        class GoalPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • actionComboBox
            List<JComboBox<String>> actionComboBox
            A list of combo boxes for selecting an action (increase/decrease) in each goal row.
          • actionList
            String[] actionList
            An array of available actions for the goal.
          • addGoalButton
            JButton addGoalButton
            Button to add a new goal definition row to the panel.
          • cancelButton
            JButton cancelButton
            Button to cancel the goal setting process.
          • forMealSelection
            MealHistoryPanel forMealSelection
            The embedded meal history panel used for meal selection.
          • getReplaceButton
            JButton getReplaceButton
            Button to trigger the search for replaceable food items based on the defined goals.
          • goalContainerPanel
            JPanel goalContainerPanel
            A container for the dynamically added goal definition rows.
          • goalRowPanel
            List<JPanel> goalRowPanel
            A list of JPanels, each representing a single goal row's UI.
          • ingredientComboBox
            JComboBox<String> ingredientComboBox
            A combo box for selecting the ingredient from the chosen meal to be swapped.
          • ingredientList
            List<FoodItem> ingredientList
            A list of FoodItem objects from the selected meal, available for swapping.
          • intensityArbiComboBox
            List<JComboBox<String>> intensityArbiComboBox
            A list of combo boxes for selecting an arbitrary intensity (e.g., "by a little bit") in each goal row.
          • intensityArbiList
            String[] intensityArbiList
            An array of user-friendly strings for arbitrary goal intensity.
          • intensityPreciseList
            String[] intensityPreciseList
            An array of string representations for precise intensity values, linked to the arbitrary list.
          • MAX_OPTIONS
            int MAX_OPTIONS
            The maximum number of goal rows a user can add.
          • MIN_OPTIONS
            int MIN_OPTIONS
            The minimum number of goal rows required.
          • nutrientComboBox
            List<JComboBox<String>> nutrientComboBox
            A list of combo boxes for selecting a nutrient in each goal row.
          • nutrientList
            String[] nutrientList
            An array to hold the list of available nutrients for the dropdowns.
          • nutrientSelectionAction
            BiConsumer<Integer,String> nutrientSelectionAction
            A callback action to be executed when a nutrient is selected, used to update available units.
          • preciseField
            List<JTextField> preciseField
            A list of text fields for specifying a precise goal intensity value.
          • removeGoalButton
            JButton removeGoalButton
            Button to remove the last added goal definition row.
          • unitCombo
            List<JComboBox<String>> unitCombo
            A list of combo boxes for selecting the unit for a precise goal in each goal row.
          • unitList
            String[] unitList
            An array of available units for precise goals.

      • Class healthyBites.view.MealHistoryPanel

        class MealHistoryPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • layoutAxis
            int layoutAxis
            The layout orientation for the meal cards (BoxLayout.Y_AXIS or BoxLayout.X_AXIS).
          • mealCardsContainer
            JPanel mealCardsContainer
            The container that holds the individual meal card JPanels.
          • mealEntries
            List<Map.Entry<Meal,Nutrition>> mealEntries
            A list to store meal entries, where each entry is a pair of a Meal object and its corresponding Nutrition object.
          • mealSelectionCallback
            Consumer<Meal> mealSelectionCallback
            A callback function to execute when a meal is selected by the user.
          • nutritionInfoPanel
            JPanel nutritionInfoPanel
            A panel at the bottom to display detailed nutrition info for the selected meal.
          • selectedMeal
            JPanel selectedMeal
            A reference to the currently selected meal card panel, used for highlighting.

            JButton addToMeal

            String[] availableIngredients
            The list of available ingredients to populate the ingredient combo boxes.
          • availableUnits
            String[] availableUnits
            The list of available units to populate the unit combo boxes.
          • backButton
            JButton backButton
            Buttons for submitting the meal, going back, and managing ingredient rows.
          • forMealSelection
            MealHistoryPanel forMealSelection
            MealHistoryPanel object in Log Meal page.
          • ingredientCombos
            List<JComboBox<String>> ingredientCombos
            A list of JComboBoxes, one for each ingredient row.
          • ingredientContainerPanel
            JPanel ingredientContainerPanel
            The container panel that holds all the ingredient row panels.
          • ingredientRowPanels
            List<JPanel> ingredientRowPanels
            A list of JPanels, where each panel represents an entire ingredient row.
          • ingredientSelectionAction
            BiConsumer<Integer,String> ingredientSelectionAction
            A callback function to execute when an ingredient is selected from a combo box.
          • MAX_INGREDIENT_DISPLAY_LENGTH
            int MAX_INGREDIENT_DISPLAY_LENGTH
            The maximum number of characters to display in the ingredient combo box before truncating with "...".
          • MAX_INGREDIENTS
            int MAX_INGREDIENTS
            The maximum number of ingredients allowed per meal.
          • mealTypeCombo
            JComboBox<String> mealTypeCombo
            ComboBox for selecting the meal type (e.g., Breakfast, Lunch).
          • MIN_INGREDIENTS
            int MIN_INGREDIENTS
            The minimum number of ingredients required per meal.
          • quantityFields
            List<JTextField> quantityFields
            A list of JTextFields for ingredient quantities.
          • removeIngredientButton
            JButton removeIngredientButton
            Buttons for submitting the meal, going back, and managing ingredient rows.
          • todaysDate
            JSpinner todaysDate
            Spinner for selecting the meal's date.
          • unitCombos
            List<JComboBox<String>> unitCombos
            A list of JComboBoxes for ingredient units.

      • Class healthyBites.view.PerMealAnalysisPanel

        class PerMealAnalysisPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • backButton
            JButton backButton
            A button to navigate back to the previous analysis options screen.
          • changedMeals
            List<Meal> changedMeals
            A list of meals that have been changed by the food swap.
          • detailTable
            JTable detailTable
            The table to display detailed nutrient changes for the selected meal.
          • listModel
            DefaultListModel<Meal> listModel
            The model for the mealList, managing the list's data.
          • mealList
            JList<Meal> mealList
            The list component to display the meals that were affected by the swap.
          • modifiedNutritions
            Map<Meal,Nutrition> modifiedNutritions
            A map storing the modified nutritional information for each meal after the swap.
          • nutrientUnits
            Map<String,String> nutrientUnits
            A map of nutrient names to their measurement units.
          • originalNutritions
            Map<Meal,Nutrition> originalNutritions
            A map storing the original nutritional information for each meal before the swap.
          • tableModel
            DefaultTableModel tableModel
            The model for the detailTable, managing the table's data and columns.
          • visualizeButton
            JButton visualizeButton
            A button to visualize the meal data as time series charts.

      • Class healthyBites.view.SwapVisualizationPanel

        class SwapVisualizationPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • analysisTitle
            String analysisTitle
            The title for the analysis visualization.
          • backButton
            JButton backButton
            Button to navigate back to the previous screen.
          • currentContext
            SwapVisualizationPanel.VisualizationContext currentContext
            The current visualization context.
          • currentStrategy
            healthyBites.view.visualization.SwapVisualizationStrategy currentStrategy
            The currently active visualization strategy.
          • modifiedData
            Map<String,Double> modifiedData
            Map holding the modified data after the swap.
          • nutrientCheckBoxes
            List<JCheckBox> nutrientCheckBoxes
            A list of all JCheckBoxes for nutrient selection.
          • nutrientSelectionPanel
            JPanel nutrientSelectionPanel
            Panel that holds the checkboxes for nutrient selection.
          • nutrientUnits
            Map<String,String> nutrientUnits
            Map of nutrient names to their measurement units.
          • onChartTypeChange
            Consumer<String> onChartTypeChange
            A callback function that is triggered when the chart type changes, used to request new data from the controller.
          • originalData
            Map<String,Double> originalData
            Map holding the original data before the swap.
          • recommendedServings
            CFGFoodGroup recommendedServings
            The recommended servings according to Canada's Food Guide, used for the CFG visualization.
          • refreshButton
            JButton refreshButton
            Button to refresh or update the current visualization.
          • showAbsoluteCheckBox
            JCheckBox showAbsoluteCheckBox
            Checkbox to toggle showing absolute values.
          • showPercentageCheckBox
            JCheckBox showPercentageCheckBox
            Checkbox to toggle showing percentage change.
          • strategies
            Map<String,healthyBites.view.visualization.SwapVisualizationStrategy> strategies
            A map of visualization strategy names to their corresponding strategy objects.
          • strategyComboBox
            JComboBox<String> strategyComboBox
            ComboBox for selecting the visualization strategy (chart type).
          • titleLabel
            JLabel titleLabel
            The main title label for the panel.
          • visualizationPanel
            JPanel visualizationPanel
            Panel where the generated chart or visualization is displayed.
